questions_and_answers.question: What is the campus address of NMAM Institute of Technology?
questions_and_answers.answer: The campus address of NMAM Institute of Technology is: Nitte, Karkala Taluk, Udupi - 574110, Karnataka, India. For further details refer: https://nmamit.nitte.edu.in/contact-nmamit.php

questions_and_answers.question: What are the contact phone numbers for NMAM Institute of Technology?
questions_and_answers.answer: The contact phone numbers for NMAM Institute of Technology are: +91 - 8258 - 281263 / 281264 / 281248 / 281461 / 281462 / 281463 / 281349, and +91 - 8258 - 281039. For further details refer: https://nmamit.nitte.edu.in/contact-nmamit.php

questions_and_answers.question: What is the email address of the Director (CM & D) at NMAM Institute of Technology?
questions_and_answers.answer: The email address of the Director (CM & D) at NMAM Institute of Technology is reg_nitte@nitte.edu.in. For further details refer: https://nmamit.nitte.edu.in/contact-nmamit.php

questions_and_answers.answer: The email address of the Chief Warden at NMAM Institute of Technology is chiefwarden@nmamit.in. For further details refer: https://nmamit.nitte.edu.in/contact-nmamit.php

questions_and_answers.answer: The email address of the Exam office at NMAM Institute of Technology is coe.nmamit@nitte.edu.in. For further details refer: https://nmamit.nitte.edu.in/contact-nmamit.php

questions_and_answers.question: What is the email address of the Deputy Registrar (NDU) at NMAM Institute of Technology?
questions_and_answers.answer: The email address of the Deputy Registrar (NDU) at NMAM Institute of Technology is dreg@nitte.edu.in. For further details refer: https://nmamit.nitte.edu.in/contact-nmamit.php
